title: Her
overview: A lonely writer develops an unexpected connection with an advanced operating system, forcing him to reconsider what intimacy and companionship can look like in a near-future Los Angeles.

title: The Farewell
overview: A Chinese-American writer returns to Changchun when the family stages an impromptu wedding as a cover for spending time with their terminally ill matriarch, blending cultures, grief, and joy.

title: Arrival
overview: When twelve mysterious spacecraft appear across the globe, a linguist is recruited by the military to communicate with the extraterrestrial visitors before global tensions boil over.

title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
overview: An artist is commissioned to paint the wedding portrait of a reluctant bride-to-be, leading to a tender romance on the remote shores of 18th-century Brittany.
